title: How To Epilate with Silk-épil 5 Wet & Dry #Ad | Braun
description:

asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
Braun and beauty vlogger Grace have come together to show you the Silk Epil 5 Wet & Dry epilator. Grace demonstrates how to use this device for longlasting smooth hair-free skin.

As a first step, Grace recommends epilating your legs in the evening so by the time you wake up, any redness will have disappeared. The epilator has 2 speed settings, for setting 1 you need to press the button once and for setting 2, press it twice. Grace prefers to use her epilator in the bath or shower as the warm water helps to sooth the process more and she recommends starting with setting 1 as it is a bit more gentle on the skin. To start epilating, hold the epilator at a 90 degree angle whilst slowly pulling it up towards your hand, then once quite a bit of the hair has been removed, you can pop on the massage roller to make the process more comfortable around more delicate areas such as the knees and back of the legs. Once you've completed your epliating, you can enjoy smooth legs for up to 4 weeks and when you epilate regularly it becomes virtually painless!

For more information about Silk Epil 5 Wet & Dry epilators check out http://www.braun.com/uk/female-grooming/silk-epil-epilators/silk-epil-5.html and visit http://www.braun.com/uk for more beauty and lifestyle products that make a difference!
